info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 25 at 6:33PM MDT until August 25 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of north central New Mexico, including the following county, east central Rio Arriba.
* WHEN...Until 930 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to slow moving thunderstorms between Canon Plaza and Ojo Caliente. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Vallecitos, Petaca, Canon Plaza, La Madera and Las Tablas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Both localized and distant heavy rainfall will create sudden and dangerous flows in arroyos and over low water crossings. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MDT THIS EVENING
